title: El Paraiso de la Salud Restaurante Vegetariano Integral
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Macrobiotic, Juice bar
description: Lima vegetarian restaurant with juice bar, seats 100+. Also sells a few health food products and takeaway food. For people visiting who don't speak Spanish, the menu is completely in Spanish so be sure to ask the staff for assistance in English.
